SQL.LOAD: SELECT comuna_code_id, region_id, comuna, postalcode, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by FROM elp_comuna_code WHERE comuna_code_id = :comuna_code_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT c.comuna_code_id, c.region_id, r.description region_dscription, r.country_id, c.comuna, c.postalcode, c.created_date, c.modified_date, c.created_by, c.modified_by FROM elp_comuna_code c, elp_region r WHERE c.region_id = r.region_id and UPPER(c.comuna) LIKE :comuna and UPPER(c.postalcode) LIKE :postalcode AND r.country_id in (SELECT co.country_id FROM elp_user_company uc, elp_company co WHERE co.company_id = uc.company_id AND uc.user_id=:user_id) --dynamic_where_clause order by c.comuna
SQL.LOAD_LIST_DYNAMIC: SELECT c.comuna_code_id, c.region_id, r.short_desc region_code, r.description region_description, c.comuna FROM elp_comuna_code c, elp_region r WHERE c.region_id = r.region_id AND r.country_id = :country_id order by r.short_desc, c.comuna
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_comuna_code SET region_id = :region_id, comuna = :comuna, postalcode = :postalcode, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE comuna_code_id = :comuna_code_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_comuna_code ( region_id, comuna, postalcode, created_by, comuna_code_id ) VALUES ( :region_id, :comuna, :postalcode, :created_by, :comuna_code_id )
